Package game

Class GameBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.GameBoard
  • public class GameBoard
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a game board for a client. It makes moves on the board and keeps track of what has been already hit and whether a certain ship has sunk. It is always created from an encoded board sent in by the client which is then decoded here.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      GameBoard​(java.lang.String encodedBoard)
      Initialises the encoded, and decoded game boards.

      Decodes and sets the encoded board that was sent in by the client.
      java.lang.String[][] getBoard()
      Getter for getting the decoded board.
      java.lang.String getEncodedBoard()
      Getter for getting the encoded board.
      boolean hasSunk​(int x, int y)
      This method checks whether whether certain coordinates are part of a sunk ship.
      boolean[] makeMove​(int x, int y)
      Called by the game instance to make a move on behalf of the opponent given x and y coordinates of the move.
      void printBoardLine​(java.lang.String code, int amount)
      Prints specific lines for the board a specific amount of times.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GameBoard

        public GameBoard​(java.lang.String encodedBoard)
        Initialises the encoded, and decoded game boards.
        Parameters:

    • Method Detail

      • decodeBoard

        public void decodeBoard​(java.lang.String encodedBoard)
        Decodes and sets the encoded board that was sent in by the client.
        Parameters:
        encodedBoard - The board to decode.

      • makeMove

        public boolean[] makeMove​(int x,
                          int y)
        Called by the game instance to make a move on behalf of the opponent given x and y coordinates of the move.
        Parameters:
        x - The X coordinate of the move.
        y - The Y coordinate of the move.
        Returns:
        Information about whether a ship was hit, whether that hit resulted in sinking the ship, and whether all ships have been destroyed.

      • allShipsDestroyed

        public boolean allShipsDestroyed()
        Checks whether all ships have been destroyed on this board.
        Returns:
        Whether all ships have been destroyed or not.

      • hasSunk

        public boolean hasSunk​(int x,
                       int y)
        This method checks whether whether certain coordinates are part of a sunk ship. This is only for single player because in multiplayer the server would do this instead.
        Parameters:
        x - The X coordinate of the move.
        y - The Y coordinate of the move.
        Returns:
        Whether a ship was sunk as a result of the move.

      • getEncodedBoard

        public java.lang.String getEncodedBoard()
        Getter for getting the encoded board.
        Returns:
        The encoded board.

      • getBoard

        public java.lang.String[][] getBoard()
        Getter for getting the decoded board.
        Returns:
        The decoded board.

      • printBoardLine

        public void printBoardLine​(java.lang.String code,
                           int amount)
        Prints specific lines for the board a specific amount of times.
        Parameters:
        code - The code given as a parameter to see what kind of line it needs to be.
        amount - the amount of times it needs to be printed.
